name: A greedy man's tale
description:
We met a strange man who promised us gold. Now we're in a dark crypt like place looking for gold. Great...

How to play
  • You lead the adventurers.
  • Keep them in safety, or lie to them. It's your choice.
  • Collect as much gold as possible! You need 100 of it and you'll share with the remaining adventurers when you leave.
  • Look around and move carefully! Traps are everywhere!
  • Throw rocks to check for traps!
  • Go back to the entrance to leave.
Controls
  • Select person - [1] [2] [3] [4]
  • Send person - [Right click]
  • Call everyone back - [Q]
  • Throw rock - [E]
